item.title: Should we legalise marijuana?
item.author: Christopher Dillon,Lingxi Huang,
item.description: Yes – Chris Dillon “The government has a contradictory policy” Why can’t I smoke cannabis? Why should the government stop me doing what I want, taking what risks that I choose, with my body? Yes, the government does other things in the name of public health, e.g. making us wear a seatbelt. However, …
